price: Wͻ kaa sε: “Yasoma yεn wͻ nnipa bͻnefoͻ bi hͻ (sε yεnkͻ sεe wͻn).
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
